Package space.sunqian.fs.base.function.function

Interface SubFunction<T,R>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the object to be applied
R - the type of the output sub-portion
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface SubFunction<T,R>
Represents an operation that accepts an object and the specified range, and returns the sub-portion of the specified range of the object.

This is a functional interface whose functional method is apply(Object, int, int).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    R
    apply(T t, int start, int end)
    Applies this function, returns sub-portion of the object from the specified start index inclusive to the end index exclusive.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      R apply(T t, int start, int end)
      Applies this function, returns sub-portion of the object from the specified start index inclusive to the end index exclusive.
      Parameters:
      t - the object
      start - the specified start index inclusive
      end - the specified end index exclusive
      Returns:
      the sub-portion result
